findings.issue: Mixture distribution with extreme range (15-100) that heavily skews results without justification
Mixture includes implausible work hours (1000-2500 range) for typical US workers
Oversimplified GDP calculation ignores productivity differences and multiplier effects
Confidence interval terminology incorrect for simulation output - should be "90% prediction interval"

findings.quote: Based on empirical studies of lottery winners and inheritance recipients
findings.issue: External validity problem - lottery/inheritance elasticities may not apply to regular UBI payments

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: statistical_validity
Severity: critical
Line: 68
Quote: "incomeEffect = inputs.incomeElasticity * (inputs.ubiAmount / (inputs.avgWage * inputs.baseWorkHours))"
Issue: Invalid elasticity calculation - should use log changes for proper income elasticity formula
[/FINDING]

parsed.issue: Invalid elasticity calculation - should use log changes for proper income elasticity formula
